summary:
Sick of the fur parts and leather soled dragonplate boots and bare arms giving you a vulnerable feeling? Well feel no more with this mod which retextures all the fur parts into daedric plating and makes use of another mod by Saratje which you need to download here or else the mod Won't work!

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/
descriptionHtml:
nstall textures:
Extract the map Dragonbone to:
Data>textures>Armor

If you haven't got a map called textures in your Data folder make one.
If you do have a textures folder in Data but you don't have an armor folder, make one.

IMPORTANT!!!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15626/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D15626%26gid%3D110]INSTALL "Alternate Dragonplate Armour - requested by LordAvernus" FOR THE BETTER MESH CLICK HERE![/url]
author: PietahW and LordAvernus
